meanings.definition: The central or most important part of something.
meanings.sent1: The noyau of the story was the unexpected plot twist.
meanings.sent2: The team captain was the noyau of the soccer team.
meanings.sent3: The noyau of the cake was the hidden surprise inside.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the noyau of the room, brightening everyone's day.
meanings.sent5: The noyau of the painting was the intricate details in the background.

meanings.definition: A fruit stone, especially of a cherry, peach, or apricot.
meanings.sent1: She accidentally bit into the noyau of the cherry.
meanings.sent2: The noyau of the peach was carefully removed before eating.
meanings.sent3: The noyau of the apricot made a surprising crunch when chewed.
meanings.sent4: The noyau of the cherry tree held the promise of future fruit.
meanings.sent5: The noyau of the peach was planted to grow a new tree.

meanings.definition: A liqueur made from brandy or other spirits flavored with fruit kernels or other substances.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed a glass of noyau after dinner.
meanings.sent2: The bartender mixed a cocktail with a splash of noyau.
meanings.sent3: The noyau added a unique flavor to the dessert.
meanings.sent4: The noyau infused the drink with a rich almond taste.
meanings.sent5: The noyau gave the drink a delightful aroma.
